The problem is in the `stopScanning()` method where you're calling `getSystemService()` incorrectly. Since we only need the Bluetooth scanner to stop the scan, we should store a reference to it when starting the scan.

Here's how you can fix it:

1. Instead of trying to get the system service in `stopScanning()`, we should keep a reference to the `BluetoothLeScanner` when we start scanning.

2. In the `startScanning()` method, after getting the BluetoothLeScanner, store it as a class member.

3. In the `stopScanning()` method, use the stored reference instead of trying to get the system service again.

 private fun startBlePeripheral() {
 if (!bluetoothAdapter.isMultipleAdvertisementSupported) {
 Log.e(TAG, "BLE Advertising not supported on this device")
 peripheralActiveState.value = false
 return
 }

 // Start GATT server
 setupGattServer()

 val advertiser = bluetoothAdapter.bluetoothLeAdvertiser ?: run {
 Log.e(TAG, "BluetoothLeAdvertiser not available")
 peripheralActiveState.value = false
 return
 }

 // Configure advertising settings
 val settings = AdvertiseSettings.Builder()
 .setAdvertiseMode(AdvertiseSettings.ADVERTISE_MODE_LOW_LATENCY)
 .setConnectable(true)
 .setTimeout(0) // 0 means advertise until explicitly stopped
 .setTxPowerLevel(AdvertiseSettings.ADVERTISE_TX_POWER_MEDIUM)
 .build()

 // Configure advertising data
 val data = AdvertiseData.Builder()
 .setIncludeDeviceName(true)
 .addServiceUuid(android.os.ParcelUuid(BleConstants.BATTERY_SERVICE_UUID))
 .build()

 // Start advertising
 try {
 advertiser.startAdvertising(settings, data, advertiseCallback)
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to start advertising: ${e.message}")
 peripheralActiveState.value = false
 }
 }
 
 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 private fun setupGattServer() {
 try {
 bluetoothGattServer = bluetoothManager.openGattServer(activity, gattServerCallback)
 
 // Create Battery Service
 val batteryService = BluetoothGattService(
 BleConstants.BATTERY_SERVICE_UUID, 
 BluetoothGattService.SERVICE_TYPE_PRIMARY
 )
 
 // Create Battery Level Characteristic
 val batteryLevelCharacteristic = BluetoothGattCharacteristic(
 BleConstants.BATTERY_LEVEL_CHARACTERISTIC_UUID,
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PROPERTY_READ or 
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PROPERTY_NOTIFY or 
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PROPERTY_WRITE,
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PERMISSION_READ or 
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PERMISSION_WRITE
 )
 
 // Add descriptor for notifications
 val descriptor = BluetoothGattDescriptor(
 BleConstants.CLIENT_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR_UUID,
 BluetoothGattDescriptor.PERMISSION_READ or 
 BluetoothGattDescriptor.PERMISSION_WRITE
 )
 batteryLevelCharacteristic.addDescriptor(descriptor)
 
 // Add characteristic to service
 batteryService.addCharacteristic(batteryLevelCharacteristic)
 
 // Add service to GATT server
 val success = bluetoothGattServer?.addService(batteryService)
 Log.d(TAG, "Service added: $success")
 
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error setting up GATT server: ${e.message}")
 peripheralActiveState.value = false
 }
 }

 batteryLevelState.value = null
 }
 gatt.close()
 }
 }

 private fun connectToDevice(device: BluetoothDevice) {
 try {
 Log.d(TAG, "Attempting to connect to ${device.address}")
 device.connectGatt(activity, false, gattClientCallback, BluetoothDevice.TRANSPORT_LE)
 } catch (e: Exception) {

 private fun findAndReadBatteryLevel(gatt: BluetoothGatt) {
 val batteryService = gatt.getService(BleConstants.BATTERY_SERVICE_UUID)
 if (batteryService != null) {
 val batteryChar = batteryService.getCharacteristic(BleConstants.BATTERY_LEVEL_CHARACTERISTIC_UUID)
 if (batteryChar != null) {
 // Read the battery level
 if (!gatt.readCharacteristic(batteryChar)) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to read battery characteristic")
 }
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Battery level characteristic not found")
 }
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Battery service not found")
 
 // If no battery service, try to find another device
 startScanning()
 }
 }
 
 private fun enableBatteryLevelNotifications(gatt: BluetoothGatt, characteristic: BluetoothGattCharacteristic) {
 // Enable local notifications
 if (!gatt.setCharacteristicNotification(characteristic, true)) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to set characteristic notification")
 return
 }
 
 // Write to descriptor to enable remote notifications
 val descriptor = characteristic.getDescriptor(BleConstants.CLIENT_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR_UUID)
 if (descriptor != null) {
 descriptor.value = BluetoothGattDescriptor.ENABLE_NOTIFICATION_VALUE
 if (!gatt.writeDescriptor(descriptor)) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to write descriptor")
 }
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Client config descriptor not found")
 }
 }
 
 private fun deviceHasBatteryService(scanResult: android.bluetooth.le.ScanResult): Boolean {
 val serviceUuids = scanResult.scanRecord?.serviceUuids
 return serviceUuids?.any { it.uuid == BleConstants.BATTERY_SERVICE_UUID } ?: false
 }

 deviceScanner.stopScanning()

 private fun setupGattServer() {
 try {
 bluetoothGattServer = bluetoothManager.openGattServer(activity, gattServerCallback)
 
 // Create Battery Service
 val batteryService = BluetoothGattService(
 BleConstants.BATTERY_SERVICE_UUID, 
 BluetoothGattService.SERVICE_TYPE_PRIMARY
 )
 
 // Create Battery Level Characteristic
 val batteryLevelCharacteristic = BluetoothGattCharacteristic(
 BleConstants.BATTERY_LEVEL_CHARACTERISTIC_UUID,
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PROPERTY_READ or 
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PROPERTY_NOTIFY or 
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PROPERTY_WRITE,
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PERMISSION_READ or 
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PERMISSION_WRITE
 )
 
 // Add descriptor for notifications
 val descriptor = BluetoothGattDescriptor(
 BleConstants.CLIENT_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR_UUID,
 BluetoothGattDescriptor.PERMISSION_READ or 
 BluetoothGattDescriptor.PERMISSION_WRITE
 )
 batteryLevelCharacteristic.addDescriptor(descriptor)
 
 // Add characteristic to service
 batteryService.addCharacteristic(batteryLevelCharacteristic)
 
 // Add service to GATT server
 val success = bluetoothGattServer?.addService(batteryService)
 Log.d(TAG, "Service added: $success")
 
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error setting up GATT server: ${e.message}")
 peripheralActiveState.value = false
 }
 }

 }

 private var gattClientCallback = object : BluetoothGattCallback() {
 override fun onConnectionStateChange(gatt: BluetoothGatt, status: Int, newState: Int) {
 val deviceAddress = gatt.device.address
 
 if (status == BluetoothGatt.GATT_SUCCESS) {
 if (newState == BluetoothProfile.STATE_CONNECTED) {
 Log.d(TAG, "Connected to $deviceAddress")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 connectionStatusState.value = "Connected"
 }
 
 // Discover services after connection is established
 gatt.discoverServices()
 } else if (newState == BluetoothProfile.STATE_DISCONNECTED) {
 Log.d(TAG, "Disconnected from $deviceAddress")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 connectionStatusState.value = "Disconnected"
 batteryLevelState.value = null
 }
 gatt.close()
 }
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error $status encountered for $deviceAddress! Disconnecting...")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 connectionStatusState.value = "Error: $status"
 batteryLevelState.value = null
 }
 gatt.close()
 }
 }

 private fun connectToDevice(device: BluetoothDevice) {
 try {
 Log.d(TAG, "Attempting to connect to ${device.address}")
 device.connectGatt(activity, false, gattClientCallback, BluetoothDevice.TRANSPORT_LE)

 private fun findAndReadBatteryLevel(gatt: BluetoothGatt) {
 val batteryService = gatt.getService(BleConstants.BATTERY_SERVICE_UUID)
 if (batteryService != null) {
 val batteryChar = batteryService.getCharacteristic(BleConstants.BATTERY_LEVEL_CHARACTERISTIC_UUID)
 if (batteryChar != null) {
 // Read the battery level
 if (!gatt.readCharacteristic(batteryChar)) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to read battery characteristic")
 }
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Battery level characteristic not found")
 }
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Battery service not found")
 
 // If no battery service, try to find another device
 startScanning()
 }
 }
 
 private fun enableBatteryLevelNotifications(gatt: BluetoothGatt, characteristic: BluetoothGattCharacteristic) {
 // Enable local notifications
 if (!gatt.setCharacteristicNotification(characteristic, true)) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to set characteristic notification")
 return
 }
 
 // Write to descriptor to enable remote notifications
 val descriptor = characteristic.getDescriptor(BleConstants.CLIENT_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR_UUID)
 if (descriptor != null) {
 descriptor.value = BluetoothGattDescriptor.ENABLE_NOTIFICATION_VALUE
 if (!gatt.writeDescriptor(descriptor)) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to write descriptor")
 }
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Client config descriptor not found")
 }
 }
 
 private fun deviceHasBatteryService(scanResult: android.bluetooth.le.ScanResult): Boolean {
 val serviceUuids = scanResult.scanRecord?.serviceUuids
 return serviceUuids?.any { it.uuid == BleConstants.BATTERY_SERVICE_UUID } ?: false
 }
 
 private fun stopDeviceScanning() {
 deviceScanner.stopScanning()
 }

 // Inner class to manage device scanning
 private inner class DeviceScanner {
 fun startScanning() {
 if (bluetoothLeScanner == null) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Bluetooth LE Scanner not available")
 return
 }
 
 Log.d(TAG, "Starting scan for devices with battery service")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 isScanningState.value = true
 }
 
 // Set up scan filters to only find devices with battery service
 val filters = listOf(
 android.bluetooth.le.ScanFilter.Builder()
 .setServiceUuid(android.os.ParcelUuid(BleConstants.BATTERY_SERVICE_UUID))
 .build()
 )
 
 // Set up scan settings
 val settings = android.bluetooth.le.ScanSettings.Builder()
 .setScanMode(android.bluetooth.le.ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_LOW_LATENCY)
 .build()
 
 try {
 // Start the scan with our filters and settings
 bluetoothLeScanner.startScan(filters, settings, scanCallback)
 
 // Automatically stop scanning after 30 seconds to save battery
 coroutineScope.launch {
 delay(30000)
 if (isScanningState.value) {
 stopScanning()
 }
 }
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error starting scan: ${e.message}")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 isScanningState.value = false
 }
 }
 }
 
 fun stopScanning() {
 if (bluetoothLeScanner == null) return
 
 try {
 bluetoothLeScanner.stopScan(scanCallback)
 Log.d(TAG, "Scan stopped")
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error stopping scan: ${e.message}")
 } finally {
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 isScanningState.value = false
 }
 }
 }
 }

 fun stopBlePeripheral() {

 bluetoothGattServer = null
 
 // Clear connected devices
 connectedDevices.clear()
 isScanningState.value = false
 
 Log.d(TAG, "BLE Peripheral stopped")
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error stopping BLE peripheral: ${e.message}")
 }
 }

package com.peri

import android.bluetooth.BluetoothManager
import android.content.Context
import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.ComponentActivity
import androidx.activity.compose.setContent
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.padding
import androidx.compose.material3.Scaffold
import androidx.compose.runtime.getValue
import androidx.compose.runtime.remember
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import com.peri.ui.theme.BluetoothPeripheralTheme

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 private lateinit var blePeripheralManager: BlePeripheralManager

 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)

 val bluetoothManager = getSystemService(Context.BLUETOOTH_SERVICE) as BluetoothManager
 
 blePeripheralManager = BlePeripheralManager(this, bluetoothManager)

 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 BluetoothPeripheralTheme {
 val batteryLevel by remember { blePeripheralManager.batteryLevelState }
 val isScanning by remember { blePeripheralManager.isScanningState }
 val peripheralActive by remember { blePeripheralManager.peripheralActiveState }
 val deviceName by remember { blePeripheralManager.deviceNameState }
 val connectionStatus by remember { blePeripheralManager.connectionStatusState }

 Scaffold { innerPadding ->
 BatteryStatusScreen(
 modifier = Modifier.padding(innerPadding),
 isPeripheralActive = peripheralActive,
 batteryLevel = batteryLevel,
 isScanning = isScanning,
 deviceName = deviceName,
 connectionStatus = connectionStatus,
 onStartPeripheral = {
 blePeripheralManager.requestBlePermissions()
 blePeripheralManager.peripheralActiveState.value = true
 },
 onStopPeripheral = {
 blePeripheralManager.stopBlePeripheral()
 blePeripheralManager.peripheralActiveState.value = false
 blePeripheralManager.batteryLevelState.value = null
 blePeripheralManager.deviceNameState.value = null
 blePeripheralManager.connectionStatusState.value = "Disconnected"
 }
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
 
 override fun onDestroy() {
 super.onDestroy()
 blePeripheralManager.stopBlePeripheral()
 }
}

 private val coroutineScope = CoroutineScope(Dispatchers.Main + Job())
 
 // BLE advertising callback
 private val advertiseCallback = object : AdvertiseCallback() {
 override fun onStartSuccess(settingsInEffect: AdvertiseSettings?) {
 Log.d(TAG, "BLE Advertising started successfully")
 isScanningState.value = true
 }

 override fun onStartFailure(errorCode: Int) {
 Log.e(TAG, "BLE Advertising failed with error: $errorCode")
 peripheralActiveState.value = false
 }
 }

 private val gattServerCallback = object : BluetoothGattServerCallback() {
 override fun onConnectionStateChange(device: BluetoothDevice, status: Int, newState: Int) {
 if (newState == BluetoothProfile.STATE_CONNECTED) {
 Log.d(TAG, "Device connected: ${device.address}")
 connectedDevices.add(device)
 isScanningState.value = false

 // Simulate receiving battery data
 requestBatteryData(device)
 } else if (newState == BluetoothProfile.STATE_DISCONNECTED) {
 Log.d(TAG, "Device disconnected: ${device.address}")
 connectedDevices.remove(device)
 if (connectedDevices.isEmpty()) {
 batteryLevelState.value = null
 }
 }

 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 override fun onCharacteristicReadRequest(
 device: BluetoothDevice,
 requestId: Int,
 offset: Int,
 characteristic: BluetoothGattCharacteristic
 ) {

 if (characteristic.uuid == BleConstants.BATTERY_LEVEL_CHARACTERISTIC_UUID) {

 )

 }
 }
 }

 ) {

 if (characteristic.uuid == BleConstants.BATTERY_LEVEL_CHARACTERISTIC_UUID) {

 if (value.isNotEmpty()) {

 private fun getPermissionLauncher(): ActivityResultLauncher<Array<String>> {
 return (activity as androidx.activity.ComponentActivity)
 .registerForActivityResult(ActivityResultContracts.RequestMultiplePermissions()) { permissions ->
 val allGranted = permissions.entries.all { it.value }
 if (allGranted) {
 // All required permissions granted, proceed with BLE operations
 checkBluetoothEnabled()
 } else {
 peripheralActiveState.value = false
 Log.e(TAG, "Required Bluetooth permissions not granted")
 }
 }
 }
 
 private fun getBluetoothEnableLauncher(): ActivityResultLauncher<Intent> {
 return (activity as androidx.activity.ComponentActivity)
 .registerForActivityResult(ActivityResultContracts.StartActivityForResult()) { result ->
 if (result.resultCode == Activity.RESULT_OK) {
 // Bluetooth is enabled, proceed with BLE operations
 startBlePeripheral()
 } else {
 peripheralActiveState.value = false
 Log.e(TAG, "Bluetooth enable request denied")
 }
 }
 }
 
 fun requestBlePermissions() {
 val permissions = if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.S) {
 arrayOf(
 Manifest.permission.BLUETOOTH_SCAN,
 Manifest.permission.BLUETOOTH_CONNECT,
 Manifest.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADVERTISE
 )
 } else {
 arrayOf(
 Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
 )
 }

 val allGranted = permissions.all {
 ContextCompat.checkSelfPermission(activity, it) == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED
 }

 if (allGranted) {
 checkBluetoothEnabled()
 } else {
 requestBlePermission.launch(permissions)
 }
 }

 private fun checkBluetoothEnabled() {
 if (!bluetoothAdapter.isEnabled) {
 val enableBtIntent = Intent(BluetoothAdapter.ACTION_REQUEST_ENABLE)
 requestEnableBluetooth.launch(enableBtIntent)
 } else {
 startBlePeripheral()
 }
 }

 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 fun startBlePeripheral() {
 if (!bluetoothAdapter.isMultipleAdvertisementSupported) {
 Log.e(TAG, "BLE Advertising not supported on this device")
 peripheralActiveState.value = false
 return
 }

 // Start GATT server
 setupGattServer()

 val advertiser = bluetoothAdapter.bluetoothLeAdvertiser ?: run {
 Log.e(TAG, "BluetoothLeAdvertiser not available")
 peripheralActiveState.value = false
 return
 }

 // Configure advertising settings
 val settings = AdvertiseSettings.Builder()
 .setAdvertiseMode(AdvertiseSettings.ADVERTISE_MODE_LOW_LATENCY)
 .setConnectable(true)
 .setTimeout(0) // 0 means advertise until explicitly stopped
 .setTxPowerLevel(AdvertiseSettings.ADVERTISE_TX_POWER_MEDIUM)
 .build()

 // Configure advertising data
 val data = AdvertiseData.Builder()
 .setIncludeDeviceName(true)
 .addServiceUuid(android.os.ParcelUuid(BleConstants.BATTERY_SERVICE_UUID))
 .build()

 // Start advertising
 try {
 advertiser.startAdvertising(settings, data, advertiseCallback)
 peripheralActiveState.value = true
 
 // Start scanning for devices with battery service
 startScanning()
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to start advertising: ${e.message}")
 peripheralActiveState.value = false
 }
 }
 
 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 private fun setupGattServer() {
 try {
 bluetoothGattServer = bluetoothManager.openGattServer(activity, gattServerCallback)
 
 // Create Battery Service
 val batteryService = BluetoothGattService(
 BleConstants.BATTERY_SERVICE_UUID, 
 BluetoothGattService.SERVICE_TYPE_PRIMARY
 )
 
 // Create Battery Level Characteristic
 val batteryLevelCharacteristic = BluetoothGattCharacteristic(
 BleConstants.BATTERY_LEVEL_CHARACTERISTIC_UUID,
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PROPERTY_READ or 
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PROPERTY_NOTIFY or 
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PROPERTY_WRITE,
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PERMISSION_READ or 
 BluetoothGattCharacteristic.PERMISSION_WRITE
 )
 
 // Add descriptor for notifications
 val descriptor = BluetoothGattDescriptor(
 BleConstants.CLIENT_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR_UUID,
 BluetoothGattDescriptor.PERMISSION_READ or 
 BluetoothGattDescriptor.PERMISSION_WRITE
 )
 batteryLevelCharacteristic.addDescriptor(descriptor)
 
 // Add characteristic to service
 batteryService.addCharacteristic(batteryLevelCharacteristic)
 
 // Add service to GATT server
 val success = bluetoothGattServer?.addService(batteryService)
 Log.d(TAG, "Service added: $success")
 
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error setting up GATT server: ${e.message}")
 peripheralActiveState.value = false
 }
 }
 
 private fun requestBatteryData(device: BluetoothDevice) {
 // In a real app, you would wait for the device to send its battery level
 // Here we're simulating receiving battery data after a short delay
 Thread {
 try {
 Thread.sleep(2000)
 // Simulate random battery value between 10-100%
 val randomBatteryLevel = (10..100).random()
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 batteryLevelState.value = randomBatteryLevel
 }
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error in requestBatteryData: ${e.message}")
 }
 }.start()
 }
 
 // Scan callback for finding remote devices
 private val scanCallback = object : android.bluetooth.le.ScanCallback() {
 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 override fun onScanResult(callbackType: Int, result: android.bluetooth.le.ScanResult) {
 val device = result.device
 val deviceName = device.name
 Log.d(TAG, "Found device: ${device.address}, Name: $deviceName")
 
 // Check if the device is suitable (has battery service or looks like a selfie remote)
 val isBatteryDevice = deviceHasBatteryService(result)
 val isSelfieRemote = deviceName != null && 
 (deviceName.contains("selfie", ignoreCase = true) ||
 deviceName.contains("remote", ignoreCase = true) ||
 deviceName.contains("shutter", ignoreCase = true) ||
 deviceName.contains("control", ignoreCase = true))
 
 if (deviceName != null && (isBatteryDevice || isSelfieRemote)) {
 Log.d(TAG, "Found suitable device: $deviceName")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 deviceNameState.value = deviceName
 }
 
 // Connect to the device to read its battery level
 connectToDevice(device)
 
 // Stop scanning once we find an appropriate device
 stopDeviceScanning()
 }
 }
 
 override fun onScanFailed(errorCode: Int) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Scan failed with error: $errorCode")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 isScanningState.value = false
 }
 }
 }

 // GATT client callback for connecting to remote devices
 private var gattClientCallback = object : BluetoothGattCallback() {
 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 override fun onConnectionStateChange(gatt: BluetoothGatt, status: Int, newState: Int) {
 val deviceAddress = gatt.device.address
 
 if (status == BluetoothGatt.GATT_SUCCESS) {
 if (newState == BluetoothProfile.STATE_CONNECTED) {
 Log.d(TAG, "Connected to $deviceAddress")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 connectionStatusState.value = "Connected"
 }
 
 // Discover services after connection is established
 gatt.discoverServices()
 } else if (newState == BluetoothProfile.STATE_DISCONNECTED) {
 Log.d(TAG, "Disconnected from $deviceAddress")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 connectionStatusState.value = "Disconnected"
 batteryLevelState.value = null
 }
 gatt.close()
 }
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error $status encountered for $deviceAddress! Disconnecting...")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 connectionStatusState.value = "Error: $status"
 batteryLevelState.value = null
 }
 gatt.close()
 }
 }
 
 override fun onServicesDiscovered(gatt: BluetoothGatt, status: Int) {
 if (status == BluetoothGatt.GATT_SUCCESS) {
 Log.d(TAG, "Services discovered")
 // Find the battery service and read the battery level
 findAndReadBatteryLevel(gatt)
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Service discovery failed with status: $status")
 }
 }
 
 override fun onCharacteristicRead(
 gatt: BluetoothGatt,
 characteristic: BluetoothGattCharacteristic,
 value: ByteArray,
 status: Int
 ) {
 if (status == BluetoothGatt.GATT_SUCCESS) {
 if (characteristic.uuid == BleConstants.BATTERY_LEVEL_CHARACTERISTIC_UUID) {
 if (value.isNotEmpty()) {
 val batteryLevel = value[0].toInt() and 0xFF
 Log.d(TAG, "Battery level read: $batteryLevel")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 batteryLevelState.value = batteryLevel
 }
 
 // Enable notifications for battery level changes
 enableBatteryLevelNotifications(gatt, characteristic)
 }
 }
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Characteristic read failed: $status")
 }
 }
 
 override fun onCharacteristicChanged(
 gatt: BluetoothGatt,
 characteristic: BluetoothGattCharacteristic,
 value: ByteArray
 ) {
 if (characteristic.uuid == BleConstants.BATTERY_LEVEL_CHARACTERISTIC_UUID) {
 if (value.isNotEmpty()) {
 val batteryLevel = value[0].toInt() and 0xFF
 Log.d(TAG, "Battery level updated: $batteryLevel")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 batteryLevelState.value = batteryLevel
 }
 }
 }
 }
 
 override fun onDescriptorWrite(
 gatt: BluetoothGatt,
 descriptor: BluetoothGattDescriptor,
 status: Int
 ) {
 if (status == BluetoothGatt.GATT_SUCCESS) {
 Log.d(TAG, "Descriptor write successful")
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Descriptor write failed: $status")
 }
 }
 }
 
 private fun hasRequiredPermissions(): Boolean {
 val permissions = if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.S) {
 arrayOf(
 Manifest.permission.BLUETOOTH_SCAN,
 Manifest.permission.BLUETOOTH_CONNECT,
 Manifest.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADVERTISE
 )
 } else {
 arrayOf(
 Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
 )
 }
 
 return permissions.all {
 ContextCompat.checkSelfPermission(activity, it) == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED
 }
 }
 
 fun startScanning() {
 if (!hasRequiredPermissions()) {
 requestBlePermissions()
 return
 }
 
 if (!bluetoothAdapter.isEnabled) {
 checkBluetoothEnabled()
 return
 }
 
 deviceScanner.startScanning()
 }
 
 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 private fun connectToDevice(device: BluetoothDevice) {
 try {
 Log.d(TAG, "Attempting to connect to ${device.address}")
 device.connectGatt(activity, false, gattClientCallback, BluetoothDevice.TRANSPORT_LE)
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error connecting to device: ${e.message}")
 }
 }
 
 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 private fun findAndReadBatteryLevel(gatt: BluetoothGatt) {
 val batteryService = gatt.getService(BleConstants.BATTERY_SERVICE_UUID)
 if (batteryService != null) {
 val batteryChar = batteryService.getCharacteristic(BleConstants.BATTERY_LEVEL_CHARACTERISTIC_UUID)
 if (batteryChar != null) {
 // Read the battery level
 if (!gatt.readCharacteristic(batteryChar)) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to read battery characteristic")
 }
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Battery level characteristic not found")
 }
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Battery service not found")
 
 // If no battery service, try to find another device
 startScanning()
 }
 }
 
 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 private fun enableBatteryLevelNotifications(gatt: BluetoothGatt, characteristic: BluetoothGattCharacteristic) {
 // Enable local notifications
 if (!gatt.setCharacteristicNotification(characteristic, true)) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to set characteristic notification")
 return
 }
 
 // Write to descriptor to enable remote notifications
 val descriptor = characteristic.getDescriptor(BleConstants.CLIENT_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR_UUID)
 if (descriptor != null) {
 descriptor.value = BluetoothGattDescriptor.ENABLE_NOTIFICATION_VALUE
 if (!gatt.writeDescriptor(descriptor)) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to write descriptor")
 }
 } else {
 Log.e(TAG, "Client config descriptor not found")
 }
 }
 
 private fun deviceHasBatteryService(scanResult: android.bluetooth.le.ScanResult): Boolean {
 val serviceUuids = scanResult.scanRecord?.serviceUuids
 return serviceUuids?.any { it.uuid == BleConstants.BATTERY_SERVICE_UUID } ?: false
 }
 
 private fun stopDeviceScanning() {
 deviceScanner.stopScanning()
 }
 
 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 fun stopBlePeripheral() {
 try {
 // Stop advertising
 bluetoothAdapter.bluetoothLeAdvertiser?.stopAdvertising(advertiseCallback)
 
 // Close GATT server
 bluetoothGattServer?.close()
 bluetoothGattServer = null
 
 // Clear connected devices
 connectedDevices.clear()
 isScanningState.value = false
 
 Log.d(TAG, "BLE Peripheral stopped")
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error stopping BLE peripheral: ${e.message}")
 }
 }
 
 // Inner class to manage device scanning
 private inner class DeviceScanner {
 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 fun startScanning() {
 if (bluetoothLeScanner == null) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Bluetooth LE Scanner not available")
 return
 }
 
 Log.d(TAG, "Starting scan for devices with battery service")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 isScanningState.value = true
 }
 
 // Set up scan filters to find both battery service devices and potential selfie remotes
 val filters = listOf(
 // Filter for battery service
 android.bluetooth.le.ScanFilter.Builder()
 .setServiceUuid(android.os.ParcelUuid(BleConstants.BATTERY_SERVICE_UUID))
 .build()
 )
 
 // Set up scan settings
 val settings = android.bluetooth.le.ScanSettings.Builder()
 .setScanMode(android.bluetooth.le.ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_LOW_LATENCY)
 .build()
 
 try {
 // Start the scan with our filters and settings
 bluetoothLeScanner.startScan(filters, settings, scanCallback)
 
 // Automatically stop scanning after 30 seconds to save battery
 coroutineScope.launch {
 delay(30000)
 if (isScanningState.value) {
 stopScanning()
 }
 }
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error starting scan: ${e.message}")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 isScanningState.value = false
 }
 }
 }
 
 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 fun stopScanning() {
 if (bluetoothLeScanner == null) return
 
 try {
 bluetoothLeScanner.stopScan(scanCallback)
 Log.d(TAG, "Scan stopped")
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Error stopping scan: ${e.message}")
 } finally {
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 isScanningState.value = false
 }
 }
 }
 }
 
 companion object {
 private const val TAG = "BlePeripheralManager"
 }

private val scanCallback = object : android.bluetooth.le.ScanCallback() {
 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 override fun onScanResult(callbackType: Int, result: android.bluetooth.le.ScanResult) {
 val device = result.device
 
 // Get device name using our helper class
 val deviceName = BleScanUtils.getDeviceName(result)
 
 Log.d(TAG, "Found device: ${device.address}, Name: $deviceName")
 
 // Check if the device is suitable (has battery service or looks like a selfie remote)
 val isBatteryDevice = deviceHasBatteryService(result)
 val isSelfieRemote = BleScanUtils.isSelfieRemote(deviceName)
 
 if (isBatteryDevice || isSelfieRemote) {

 activity.runOnUiThread {
 deviceNameState.value = deviceName
 }
 
 // Connect to the device to read its battery level
 connectToDevice(device)
 
 // Stop scanning once we find an appropriate device
 stopDeviceScanning()
 }
 }
 
 override fun onScanFailed(errorCode: Int) {
 Log.e(TAG, "Scan failed with error: $errorCode")
 activity.runOnUiThread {
 isScanningState.value = false
 }
 }
}

2. Properly handle selfie remote detection using our helper method
3. Make sure we can display device names correctly in the UI

The issue happens because many Bluetooth devices don't properly advertise their names or return null from the getName() method, especially selfie remotes which are often simple devices. Our solution provides multiple fallbacks to ensure we always have a readable name to display.

package com.peri

import android.bluetooth.le.ScanResult
import android.annotation.SuppressLint

/**
 * Helper class for BLE device discovery
 */
object BleScanUtils {
 
 /**
 * Gets a reliable device name from a scan result
 * Handles cases where device.getName() returns null
 * 
 * @param result The scan result from Bluetooth LE scanner
 * @return A non-null device name (or a fallback using the address)
 */
 @SuppressLint("MissingPermission")
 fun getDeviceName(result: ScanResult): String {
 val device = result.device
 val address = device.address
 
 // Try to get name from device - this requires BLUETOOTH_CONNECT permission
 var deviceName = try {
 device.name
 } catch (e: SecurityException) {
 null
 }
 
 // If null, try scan record
 if (deviceName == null) {
 deviceName = result.scanRecord?.deviceName
 }
 
 // Final fallback - use address
 if (deviceName == null) {
 deviceName = "Device ($address)"
 }
 
 return deviceName
 }
 
 /**
 * Checks if a device might be a selfie remote based on its name
 */
 fun isSelfieRemote(deviceName: String): Boolean {
 return deviceName.contains("selfie", ignoreCase = true) ||
 deviceName.contains("remote", ignoreCase = true) ||
 deviceName.contains("shutter", ignoreCase = true) ||
 deviceName.contains("control", ignoreCase = true)
 }
}

package com.peri

import android.Manifest
import android.bluetooth.BluetoothAdapter
import android.bluetooth.BluetoothManager
import android.content.Context
import android.content.Intent
import android.content.pm.PackageManager
import android.os.Build
import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.ComponentActivity
import androidx.activity.compose.setContent
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.activity.result.contract.ActivityResultContracts
import androidx.activity.viewModels
import androidx.compose.material3.Scaffold
import androidx.compose.material3.SnackbarHost
import androidx.compose.material3.SnackbarHostState
import androidx.compose.runtime.remember
import androidx.compose.runtime.rememberCoroutineScope
import androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat
import androidx.core.content.ContextCompat
import com.peri.ui.theme.BluetoothPeripheralTheme
import kotlinx.coroutines.launch

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {

 private val bleViewModel: BleViewModel by viewModels()
 private val requiredPermissions = if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.S) {
 arrayOf(
 Manifest.permission.BLUETOOTH_SCAN,
 Manifest.permission.BLUETOOTH_CONNECT,
 Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
 )
 } else {
 arrayOf(
 Manifest.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
 )
 }

 private val bluetoothAdapter: BluetoothAdapter? by lazy {
 val bluetoothManager = getSystemService(Context.BLUETOOTH_SERVICE) as BluetoothManager
 bluetoothManager.adapter
 }

 private val requestPermissionLauncher = registerForActivityResult(
 ActivityResultContracts.RequestMultiplePermissions()
 ) { permissions ->
 val allGranted = permissions.entries.all { it.value }
 if (allGranted) {
 enableBluetooth()
 } else {
 bleViewModel.updateError("Permission denied. Cannot scan for BLE devices.")
 }
 }

 private val enableBluetoothLauncher = registerForActivityResult(
 ActivityResultContracts.StartActivityForResult()
 ) { result ->
 if (result.resultCode == RESULT_OK) {
 bleViewModel.startScanning(this)
 } else {
 bleViewModel.updateError("Bluetooth must be enabled to use this app.")
 }
 }

 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 BluetoothPeripheralTheme {
 val snackbarHostState = remember { SnackbarHostState() }
 val scope = rememberCoroutineScope()
 
 Scaffold(
 snackbarHost = { SnackbarHost(snackbarHostState) }
 ) { innerPadding ->
 BleScreen(
 viewModel = bleViewModel,
 paddingValues = innerPadding,
 onScanClick = { checkPermissionsAndScan() },
 onShowError = { message ->
 scope.launch {
 snackbarHostState.showSnackbar(message)
 }
 }
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
 
 private fun checkPermissionsAndScan() {
 if (bluetoothAdapter == null) {
 bleViewModel.updateError("Bluetooth is not supported on this device")
 return
 }
 
 val permissionsToRequest = requiredPermissions.filter {
 ContextCompat.checkSelfPermission(this, it) != PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED
 }.toTypedArray()
 
 if (permissionsToRequest.isEmpty()) {
 enableBluetooth()
 } else {
 requestPermissionLauncher.launch(permissionsToRequest)
 }
 }
 
 private fun enableBluetooth() {
 if (bluetoothAdapter?.isEnabled == true) {
 bleViewModel.startScanning(this)
 } else {
 val enableBtIntent = Intent(BluetoothAdapter.ACTION_REQUEST_ENABLE)
 enableBluetoothLauncher.launch(enableBtIntent)
 }
 }
}
